snippet: Ultimate Poker, which is owned by a Las Vegas casino company, became the first online, pay-to-play gambling Web site to operate in the United States.
abstract: Ultimate Poker, which is owned by Las Vegas casino company Station Casinos, becomes first online, pay-to-play gambling Web site to operate in United States; 30-day trial period will be closely watched by gambling and tech industries, who see it as test in debate about legality of online gambling.
lead_paragraph: Ultimate Poker, which is owned by a Las Vegas casino company, became the first online, pay-to-play gambling Web site to operate in the United States.

headline.seo: Poker Web Site Advances Online Gambling
headline.main: Las Vegas Web Site Is Test for Legal Online Gambling
headline.print_headline: Las Vegas Web Site Is Test For Legal Online Gambling
